title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses another disappointing loss for the Lakers and why despite this team winning a championship in 2020, they were always destined to fail in the long term. He explains why Joe Burrow and the Bengals are a great story, but we shouldn't bet on them being a Super Bowl contender for years to come. He also reacts to huge breaking news out of the NBA with the Nets and 76ers making a huge trade sending Ben Simmons to Brooklyn and James Harden to Philadelphia. Plus, Super Bowl champion Emmanuel Sanders joins the show in studio to talk about their crushing defeat to the Chiefs in the playoffs and if he's returning to play for another title contender. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
